Comment_glosser: Literally ‘all the fingers on one hand hiding the thumb’ according to contributor comment.

Comment_contributor: ( litː all the fingers on one hand )
( litː all the fingers on one hand and another)
( litː all the fingers on one hand and two on another)

Value: moni imik ai polakae kýk ai moni imi
Comment_contributor: ( litː all the fingers on one hand and two and another finger )

Value: moni imik ai moni imik xahomai moni imi
Comment_contributor: ( litː all the fingers on one hand and all the fingers hiding the thumb on the other hand )
